pageSubtitle: Empowering learners through personalized AI-driven education
missionText: At ID Picker, we believe every student has a unique way of learning. Our mission is to revolutionize education by providing personalized learning experiences through advanced AI technology. We analyze your learning style and create tailored pathways to help you achieve your educational goals efficiently and effectively.

aiAnalysis.title: AI-Powered Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Using advanced algorithms to understand your unique learning patterns
